summary: P71 Vitrin Yönetimi (Showcase Management) - Full E2E testing completed. Backend APIs fully functional. Admin UI working correctly with save/publish workflow. Public HomePage correctly applies showcase layout config.

minor.issue: Empty category_id/slug in categories array does not return 400 - backend normalizes instead of rejecting

critical_code_review_comments: Backend showcase layout endpoints properly implemented with validation and normalization
Frontend AdminShowcaseManagement page has all required data-testid attributes for testing
Public HomePage correctly consumes showcase layout config via GET /api/site/showcase-layout
Version history with load/publish workflow working correctly
Default homepage showcase: 9 rows x 7 columns x 63 listings
seed_data_creation: Created multiple showcase layout versions during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: P71 Vitrin Yönetimi feature is fully functional. Backend endpoints: GET /api/site/showcase-layout (public), GET /api/admin/site/showcase-layout, GET /api/admin/site/showcase-layout/configs, PUT /api/admin/site/showcase-layout/config, GET /api/admin/site/showcase-layout/config/{id}, POST /api/admin/site/showcase-layout/config/{id}/publish. Admin page at /admin/site-design/showcase allows editing homepage showcase settings (rows, columns, listing_count) and category showcase configurations. Save draft creates new version, publish marks it as active.
